Dear Sir/ Madam,

I am a fan of Disneyland from Hong Kong. Not long ago I found a Hong Kong-based group called ‘JapFans 一番日本’ attempting to infringe the copyright of a series of Disneyland Line App Stickers.

JapFans converted the Line App Stickers I believe Disneyland team created into Whatsapp Stickers with the replacement of English words into Traditional Chinese words.

This group has been promoting the sticker on Facebook and Instagram so far as I acknowledged and they claimed to have originated those stickers. The group seem to be profiting from the stickers.

Please follow up on this infringement issue and if this is not the correct place to lodge my complaint about this group, may I ask for the correct place to hand in this email?

Pasted with two of the group’s links on the social media promoting the unlawful stickers. Thank you.

https://www.facebook.com/japfantasia/
https://instagram.com/japanfans_store?utm_source=ig_profile_share&igshid=3tjsxw7xmu50

Regards,
XXX

This group has been promoting the sticker on Facebook and Instagram so far as I acknowledged and they claimed to have originated those stickers. The group seem to be profiting from the stickers.

Subject: A suspected issue of copyright infringement

Dear Sir/ Madam,

I am a fan of Disneyland from Hong Kong. Not long ago I found a Hong Kong-based group called ‘JapFans 一番日本’ attempting to infringe the copyright in a series of Disneyland Line App Stickers.

JapFans converted the stickers from the Line App into Whatsapp Stickers with the replacement of Traditional Chinese characters (Cantonese). And I believe that the stickers are owned by Disney/Pixar as shown in the photos below.

This group has been promoting the sticker on Facebook and Instagram so far and claiming to be the creator, while they seem to be profiting from the stickers, such as to gain the reputation and make noises for their own good on business.

Please follow up on this infringement issue.

I have attached two social media pages of them. They use them to promote the unlawful stickers. And some photos will be sent to you for the evidence as well.

https://www.facebook.com/japfantasia
https://instagram.com/japanfans_store?utm_source=ig_profile_share&igshid=3tjsxw7xmu50

Please feel free to liaise with me if you have any concerns regarding this issue. Thank you.

Regards,
XXX
